segments.text: I notice the girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she really trusts her brother to get her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is barely holding him up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve practiced this before or if it’s their first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, which is probably for the best right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s smile is so sweet, even though they’re doing something they shouldn’t.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost within reach, but the stool is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they both are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is getting worse, but they don’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
